attributes.action: scrap cycle forward boxes, (cycle lanes across the road in front of motor vehicles at traffic light junctions).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These are nothing to do with road safety. I see their purpose as a way of using cyclists as "human shields" to slow down motorised traffic, and as yet another way of intimidating motorists. I have yet to see a cyclist actually use one!
